This page catalogs all of the content updates for Red Dead Redemption 2 Online, beginning with the November 2018 public beta and ending with the Sept. 29, 2020 update.

Red Dead Redemption 2 Online Updates

advertisement

Listed below is the complete list of major Red Dead Redemption 2 (RDR2) Online updates since the game mode launched in November 2018, ending with the Sept. 29, 2020 update.

For more recent updates, visit our Red Dead Online Updates page here.

May 4, 2021: Double RDO$ on Free Roam Missions, Naturalist Rewards, and Much More

  • Players can gain Double Cash (RDO$) in the following this week:
    Free Roam Missions
  • Players can also obtain the following for hunting, killing, and skinning any Legendary Animal in Free Roam or while on a Sighting Mission this week:

    Weight Gain Tonic
    Weight Loss Tonic

    Naturalist XP (x1000)

    Naturalist Established/Distinguished Role Item (40% Off - Offer)

February 16, 2021: Claim Double Rewards in Naturalist Free Roam Events, Naturalist Bonuses, and More

  • The following new content has been added to Red Dead Online:
    A New Source of Employment (Telegram Missions)
  • The first mission, A One Horse Deal, asks players to intercept and tame a white Arabian racehorse from Emerald Ranch, then deliver it to their contact, while fending off those who would reclaim it.
  • The second mission, Rich Pickings, tasks players with breaking into the Mayor’s manor in Saint Denis, stealing precious gems, and making it out.
  • The third mission, Outrider, charges players with defending a wagon as it makes its way from Brittlebrush Trawl to its destination.
  • Each mission has three difficulty levels, and the difficulty will get ramped up each time you replay them. To begin these missions, visit your mailbox at a local Post Office or your Camp Lockbox
  • These missions are designed for solo players only, and special completion bonuses can be obtained to celebrate their release.
  • Complete any of the three A New Source of Employment missions to obtain the following:
    5,000 Club XP (Reward - Any ANSoE mission)
    RDO$100 (Reward - Any ANSoE mission)
    Treasure Map (Reward - Any ANSoE mission)
    Arabian Horse (30% Off - Reward for ‘A One Horse Deal’ mission)
    Special Horse Revivers (x2 - Reward for ‘A One Horse Deal’ mission)
    Lost Jewelry (x3 - Reward for ‘Rich Pickings’ mission)
    Family Heirloom Collectibles (x3 - Reward for ‘Rich Pickings’ mission)
    Small Game Arrows (x20 - Reward for ‘Outrider’ mission)
    Express Revolver Cartridges (x100 - Reward for ‘Outrider’ mission)
  • Completing any Legendary Animal Sighting Missions for Harriet will earn players the following this week:
    Established or Distinguished Naturalist Role Item (40% Off - Offer)
    Repeater (40% Off - Offer - Naturalists Role Rank 10+)
  • Get Double XP and RDO$ in the following this week:
    Naturalist Free Roam Events

November 24, 2020: New Bounty Hunters Expansion, RDO Standalone Game Announced, And More

A new Bounty Hunters Role Expansion has been announced, which will arrive next week. The expansion will add new criminals to track, Prestigious level equipment and skills which can be unlocked via 10 more Bounty Hunter ranks, as well as new Legendary Bounties and a 100 Rank Outlaw Pass. A standalone version of Red Dead Online has also been announced, so players can take part in the online game without purchasing Red Dead Redemption 2. It will normally cost $20, but will be discounted to just $5 from the launch date (Dec. 1, 2020) until February 15, 2021. Console versions will require Xbox Live Gold / PlayStation Plus, and versions will also come to the Rockstar Games Launcher, Epic Games, and Steam. The standalone version of RDO will require up to 123GB of space and will include an option to unlock RDR2’s story mode via in-game paid unlock.

July 28, 2020: Take On The Naturalist Frontier Pursuit, New Outlaw Pass, And More

  • Starting today, players can obtain the brand new Frontier Pursuit, The Naturalist. The Naturalist will track, hunt, and study animals, including brand new Legendary Animals.
  • Naturalists will gain access to the following:
    New Skills (Mercy Kills, etc.)
    Advanced Camera
    Animal-Based Free Roam Events
    Role-Specific Weapons
    Role-Specific Outfits
    Role-Specific Horse
    Accessories
    New Tonics & Recipes (Weight Loss and Weight Gain, Animal Revivers, Stealth-Boosting, Weather-Mitigating Tonics, Etc.)
  • Progressing through the Naturalist Role, players will also gain the ability to create Wilderness Camps, which allow up to four players to cook, craft, and rest.
  • A total of seven new Legendary Animals, including three subspecies each, have been added. These creatures can also be incorporated into the new Animal Field Guide.
  • The new Legendary Animals that have been added to the game include the following, although more will be added in the coming weeks:
    Cougars
    Foxes
    Boars
    Beavers
    Wolves
    Bison
    Elk
  • Free Roam Legendary Animals can be found throughout all five states. Use your Animal Field Guide and Legendary Animal Map to locate them.
  • The Animal Field Guide will allow progression through the Naturalist Frontier Pursuit, and will log every animal the player has encountered, in addition to providing hints on how to find and track big game.
  • Interested parties should travel to the Welcome Center in Strawberry to meet with their new contacts, Harriet Davenport and Gus MacMillan, who will provide them with the following:
    Sample Kit
    Animal Field Guide
    Legendary Animal Map
  • Conservationist Harriet Davenport will task the player with tracking down these rare creatures, sedate them, and obtain blood samples without killing them, as well as liberating caged creatures from poachers. Returning the blood samples to Harriet will claim hefty rewards.
  • Naturalists who prefer to preserve animals will gain access to the Naturalist Varmint Rifle, with Sedative Cartridges to enable safe sample collection, as well as Animal Reviver Tonic, to rouse the creatures when the collection is done.
  • Big game hunter Gus MacMillan will also reward the player for tracking down these animals, poaching them, and collecting perfect pelts. Players who return pelts to MacMillan will be awarded unique clothing and special animal trinkets, but will alienate Harriet by doing so.
  • Naturalists who intend to harvest pelts will gain access to the Improved Bow and Bow Grips, as well as the Elephant Rifle (with Nitro Express Ammo).
  • The Gypsy Cob horse breed has also been added, which includes the following:
    Six Coat Variations
    Improved Saddle & Saddle Bags
  • The Advanced Camera, which is available for all players via the Wheeler, Rawson & Co. Catalogue, features improvements including increased mobility (players can move and crouch while using the camera), an improved set of features including intensity-adjustable filters, the ability to auto-study Animals by taking their picture, and more.
  • The Naturalist Update also brings over 800 new clothing items and variants to Red Dead Online, including Legendary Animal Garment Sets obtained from MacMillan in exchange for Legendary Animal parts, pelts, and carcasses.
  • Naturalists will be able to take on special Legendary Animal Sighting Missions, which will grant access to exclusive species of beasts.
  • New Naturalist Free Roam Events have also been added, including the following:
    Protect Legendary Animals
    Animal Tagging
  • Protect Legendary Animals will enable 2-12 players to work together to protect a Legendary Animal from enemy Poachers. Players will only have one chance, and one life, to guard the animal as it makes its escape.
  • Animal Tagging will task 2-12 players to fight off Poachers while tagging special animals for sample collection. Meeting tag quotas will cause a bonus Legendary Animal to appear.
  • Additional improvements arriving in the Naturalist update include the following:
    Asynchronous matchmaking (for faster load times)
    Improved Threat Indicator
    Updated Daily Challenges (New General / Role Daily Challenges, Total Role Challenge Increase)
    Updated Daily Challenge Rewards
    Improved Wardrobe System (More combinations & removal options)
    New Clothing
    New Hairstyles
    New Accessories
    New Emotes
    Over 250 fixes, balancing adjustments, and general improvements
  • Also debuting with the Naturalist update is the free Wheeler, Rawson & Co. Club, and the third Outlaw Pass.
  • The Wheeler Rawson & Co. Club is free, and all players are automatically enrolled, so feel free to rack up Club Ranks to unlock new perks.
  • The third Outlaw Pass (which lasts until October 19) will give players new items and bonuses to unlock as they progress through 80 ranks. Jump in for 40 Gold Bars and earn rewards, including the following:
    40 Gold Bars
    New Weapon Metals
    New Weapon Engravings
    Australian Shepherd Camp Dog
    Camp Accessories
    Advanced Camera Filters, Effects, Etc.
    New Rewards
    New Offers
    15% Role XP Boost During Club Membership
  • New elements have also been added to Free Roam, including fellow hunters tracking prey (who may request your aid), crashed wagons with loot to claim, and even intoxicated drivers looking for help.
  • From now until August 3, all Naturalists can claim 2X payouts on the following:
    Tier 3 Legendary Animal Samples
    Whole Carcass Sales
  • Complete Naturalist activities over the next four weeks to claim the following benefits:
    Free Role Accessory, Outfit, or Emote (Reward - Become a Naturalist)
    Gila Monster Camp Flag (Reward - Sedate and sample any animal)
    Farnholme Double Bandolier (Unique Colorway) (Reward - Complete a Legendary Animal Sighting Mission)
    Treasure Map (Reward - Pitch a Wilderness Camp)
  • Players can also claim the following Bonus Offers and Rewards:

  • PlayStation 4 players will receive the following gifts:

  • PlayStation 4 players will also receive the following Early Access bonuses:

In this Red Dead Online update, Rockstar announced the arrival of Double Rewards for Showdown Series, Showdown Mode, four new Showdown Maps, and more.

Note: A portion of the proceeds from Red Dead Online and GTA Online over April and May 2020 will go towards relief for those affected by COVID-19. See additional details here.
  • This week, score Double XP in the following:
    Any Showdown Series
  • The following maps have been added to the Showdown Series (with new maps coming to two more Showdown Modes in the coming weeks):
    Pike’s Basin (Overrun)
    Roanoke Valley (Spoils of War)
    Stillwater Creek (Plunder)
    Kamassa River (Up In Smoke)
  • These maps will pit players against each other with Throwing Knives at first, and Shotguns can be picked up at various points on the map.
  • Map: Pike’s Basin:
    Showdown Mode: Overrun
    Description: ”A good, old-fashioned turf war in the arid climes of Pike's Basin. The rules are simple: Capture and retain the most territories to win. It's surviving and holding on that are the hard part.”
  • Map: Roanoke Valley:
    Showdown Mode: Spoils of War
    Description: Just to the north of the Annesburg Mines, the great state of New Hanover plays host to a deadly game of capture. Defend your stockpile from enemies while stealing from them at the same time. Whichever team steals the most wins. Other players no longer appear blipped on the mini-map in this new Showdown map.
  • Map: Stillwater Creek:
    Showdown Mode: Plunder
    Description: Take control of unclaimed loot in the long grass and murky waters of Stillwater Creek, returning it to your team's home base to outscore your rivals. Other players no longer appear blipped on the mini-map in this new Showdown map.
  • Map: Kamassa River:
    Showdown Mode: Up in Smoke
    Description: The calm waters of the meandering Kamassa River are the backdrop for this frenetic and explosive mode. All players start out carrying a package -- the goal is to deliver said package to your enemy's camp without getting killed. Whichever team delivers the most or all of their packages by the end of the game will destroy the enemy base for good. Other players no longer appear blipped on the mini-map in this new Showdown map.

    Day of Reckoning (Bounty Hunter)
    Manhunt (Bounty Hunter)
    Trade Route (Trader)
    Condor Egg (Collector)
    Salvage (Collector)
  • Day of Reckoning - Bounty Hunters compete for points by capturing wanted targets (2-8 players, Req. Bounty Hunter Rank 4)
  • Manhunt - Bounty Hunters cooperate to clear wanted targets and henchmen from a specified area (2-12 players, Req. Bounty Hunter Rank 4)
  • Trade Route - Traders team up to defend a train from bandits (2-12 players, Req. Trader Rank 4)
  • Condor Egg - Collectors race to find a single Condor Egg in a specified area (2-12 players, Req. Collector Rank 4)
  • Salvage - Collectors scavenge a wreck to gather what riches they can as they fight off bandits, who are hungry for the same loot (2-12 players, Req. Collector Rank 4)

This week, players can take advantage of the special Frontier Pursuit Role XP bonuses. Complete the specified Role activities and claim your XP in the Benefits section of the menu. Dec. 13, 2019: Moonshiners Frontier Pursuit Available Now

In this Red Dead Online update, Rockstar announced the arrival of the brand new Moonshiners Frontier Pursuit. This week, the Moonshiner Frontier Pursuit is available, allowing players to start up their own moonshine business, team up with a notorious distiller, obtain a new Shack property, and much more.Moonshining requires players to have taken up the Trader Frontier Pursuit and achieved one of the following:
Trader Rank 5
Completed one Trader Sell Mission Once those goals have been reached, the player will be contacted by Cripps to move forward with meeting Maggie Fike at Emerald Ranch. Players will be able to purchase one of five Moonshining Shacks, which they will use to house their distillery. Players will be able to purchase these additional, optional upgrades for their Moonshining Shack:
Bar
Band and Dancefloor
Moonshining equipment upgrades Moonshiners will also gain access to new Story Missions, which can be played either solo or with your Posse. These Story Missions will team the player up with Maggie to expand their alcoholic empire and get a little revenge while they are at it. Acquire new recipes, fight off rivals, build a customer base, experiment with different drink blends, and expand your distribution. Moonshiners will unlock new clothing and accessories as they move through the progression system, as well as weapons like the Flammable Moonshine Jug, new design for the Sawed-Off Shotgun, new Horse Breeds, and more.

The Owlhoot Family is wanted in connection to a large number of murders around Benedict Pass, and are currently known to operate out of Rio Bravo. This legendary bounty will be available until Oct. 7, and Bounty Hunters who complete it will receive 5 Tomahawks, so visit a Bounty Board for details. After completing the bounty, wait a short while and it will reappear at an increased difficulty. This week, a new Collector Free Roam Event is available, so players should be on the lookout for the following:
Condor Egg The first player to find the Egg will get to keep it, and the event is available to all Collectors who are Rank 4 or higher. Wander the world in Free Roam and keep your eyes peeled for an invite (and condors circling overhead). The Hunter Hatchet is now available from Fences in the following locations: :
Saint Denis
Emerald Ranch
Van Horn
RhodesThis week, RDO players can defend their stockpile from raiding enemies in Free-Aim Spoils of War, located in the Online menu.Play RDO through Oct. 7 to gain the following:
RDO$200 Complete any Role Free Roam Event through Oct. 7 to gain the following:
Fuentes Poncho

    Morales Vest

Sept. 24, 2019: Wolf Man Legendary Bounty, New Nazar Collectibles

In this Red Dead Online update, Rockstar announced the arrival of the second Legendary Bounty, new collectibles, and more. Players can now tackle the second of 10 new Legendary Bounties; the bounty for The Wolf Man. The Wolf Man is wanted in connection to a string of violent murders and is rumored to be in hiding near Lake Isabella. Visit a Bounty Board for details on the Wolf Man, wait a while after completing the mission to unlock a more difficult version of the bounty, and take Predator Bait to make the encounter easier. On 4 and 5-star difficulty, players will be required to capture him alive. Bounty Hunters who complete the Wolf Man Legendary Bounty will receive the following, sent to the Post Office or Camp Lockbox:
Red Strayhorn BootsThis week, Madam Nazar is looking for a new collection of items this week (the Saint Denis Collection), so players should be on the lookout for the following:
Cognac
Beaulieux Diamond Ring
Beauchêne Ruby Earrings Collect each one, then return the collection to Nazar or a Post Office before Sept. 30 to claim the rewards. This week, competitive RDO players can participate in the Free Aim Elimination Series, located in the Online menu.

Sept. 17, 2019: Alcazar Legendary Bounty, New Collectibles

In this Red Dead Online update, Rockstar announced the arrival of the first Legendary Bounty, new collectibles, and more. Players can now tackle the first of 10 new Legendary Bounties; the bounty for Barbarella Alcazar. Visit a Bounty Board for details on Alcazar, and complete the bounty before Sept. 23 to obtain special awards, which are increased if she is brought in alive. This week, Madam Nazar is looking for the Pearls of the Sea collection this week, so players should be on the lookout for the following:

Sept. 10, 2019: Frontier Pursuits, Outlaw Pass Available

In this Red Dead Online update, Rockstar announced the arrival of Frontier Pursuits, the Wheeler, Rawson and Co. Club, the Outlaw Pass, and more. For a complete list of patch notes, visit the Rockstar Support page. Starting today, players can adopt one (or all) of three new Specialist Roles:
Bounty Hunter
Trader
Collector These Frontier Pursuits will gain Role XP as players complete specific activities associated with them (hunting bounties, hunting beasts, and finding secret treasures). Specific necessary items used to unlock each role can be purchased by all players for 15 Gold Bars, and can be obtained for free under the following circumstances:
Players who linked their Twitch Prime and Rockstar Games Social Club accounts by Sunday, Sept. 8 will receive the Bounty Hunter License free. Those who missed the deadline will see the License appear within 72 hours of linking accounts.
Players who found all 54 hidden playing cards in GTA Online can snag the Collector’s Bag for free through Oct. 14.
Players with an active PlayStation Plus subscription can get the Butcher’s Table (for Traders) through Oct. 14. Rockstar has announced the addition of the new, free RDO membership program. Called the Wheeler, Rawson & Co. Club, players are automatically enrolled in the program by playing RDO between Sept. 10 and Nov. 18.

  • Participation in the Wheeler, Rawson & Co. Club will award the following as they accumulate XP and Role XP:
    New clothing

    New custom outfit slots (and the ability to name slots)
    New Role-specific Free Roam Events)
    Looted Jewelry now sells for more cash
    Increased movement and animation speed (including aiming, cocking, reloading, looting, etc.)
    Other balancing changes and improvements

Rockstar announced more activities, including Legendary Bounties, weekly maps with special collectible sets, new bonuses, gifts, and more will be revealed in the weeks to come. Sept. 5, 2019: Wheeler, Rawson and Co. Club, The Outlaw Pass Announced

In this Red Dead Online update, Rockstar announced the upcoming Wheeler, Rawson and Co. Club, the Outlaw Pass, and more. Rockstar has announced the addition of the new, free RDO membership program. Called the Wheeler, Rawson & Co. Club, players are automatically enrolled in the program, which awards members as they accumulate XP and Role XP.

  • Participation in the Wheeler, Rawson & Co. Club will award the following:
    Clothing
    Accessories
    Bonus Cash
    Free Tonics
    A Special Gun Wrap
    Etc.

The Club Membership period lasts from Sept. 10 - Nov. 18, and rewards unlocked during this period will be available for players from this point forward.Rockstar also announced The Outlaw Pass, a new Rank-based progression system (70 Ranks total) which allows players to earn unique rewards.

  • Players who purchase The Outlaw Pass for 35 Gold Bars will obtain the following:
    Exclusive Clothing
    Weapon Styles
    Campsite Adornments
    Bonus Cash
    Special Vouchers
    Bonus Gold Bars
    Other misc. rewards

Players who unlock all 70 Ranks of The Outlaw Pass during the membership period will earn a total of 35 Gold Bars, effectively negating the cost of the Pass. Like the Wheeler, Rawson & Co. Club, membership in The Outlaw Pass lasts from Sept. 10 to Nov. 18, and all unlocked rewards will remain available for players after the membership period expires.

Sept. 3, 2019: Red Dead Online Summer Update Announcement, Details

This week in Red Dead Online, Rockstar announced the upcoming Red Dead Online Summer Update, detailed the additions coming in the update, and more. The Red Dead Online Summer Update arrives Sept. 10.

  • The update will add Frontier Pursuits, Specialist Roles, new avenues for progression, and more.
  • Rockstar also announced the following updates as part of the Summer Update:
    New Ability Cards
    New Daily Challenges
    New Daily Role Challenges
    More Dynamic Events
    New Items
    Improved Player Control/Character Movement
    New Role Free Roam Events
    Additional Stable Slots
    Improved Jewelry Selling Prices
    More Custom Outfit Slots (and Outfit Slot Naming)
    Weapon Rebalancing
    and more.
  • Specialist Roles to be added in the Summer Update include:
    Bounty Hunter
    Trader
    Collector

New Progression options will be associated with each of these roles. No matter which Role you choose, you’ll gather Role XP as you complete activities associated with that Role. Complete a Bounty to earn Bounty Hunter Role XP, etc.

  • Each Role has 20 Ranks, broken down into tiers:
    Novice (Ranks 1-5)
    Promising (Ranks 6-10)
    Established (Ranks 11-15)
    Distinguished (Ranks 16-20)

Each Role will unlock certain exclusive skills and items as it increases in Rank, and unlocking new Role Ranks will award Role Tokens, which can be redeemed for special Role-specific abilities, upgrades, and more. The Bounty Hunter The Bounty Hunter can be unlocked by purchasing a Bounty Hunter License from the Legendary Bounty Hunter in Rhodes for 15 Gold Bars.

  • Players who link their Red Dead Redemption 2 Social Club accounts to Twitch Prime before Sept. 8 can obtain the Bounty Hunter License for free, beginning Sept. 10.

Bounty Hunters will pick up additional jobs at Bounty Boards in key locations, which will task them with taking down criminals. Bringing them in alive grants a bonus, and bounties will be split among if the Bounty Hunter is in a Posse. Once the player has surpassed Rank 12, Bounty Hunters will be able to hunt other players in timed pursuit encounters.

  • Key Bounty Hunter Skills and Items Include the following:
    Focus (Targets glow red during Eagle Eye)
    Reinforced Lasso
    Tonics Satchel Upgrade (Holds more items)
    Eagle Eye+ (Tracks enemies while sprinting, galloping)
    Tracking Arrow Pamphlet (Recipe for crafting Tracking Arrows)
    Ducking (a defensive horseback riding maneuver)
    Kit Satchel Upgrade (Holds more items)
    Bolas (Snare throwing weapon)
    Bounty Wagon (used to transport captured criminals)
    Perception (Increased range on bounty notifications)
    Spin Up (Performed with single Pistol/Revolver)
    Reverse Spin (Performed with single Pistol/Revolver)
    Reverse Spin Up (Performed with single Pistol/Revolver)
    Alternating Flips (Performed with single Pistol/Revolver)
    Dual Gun Spinning (Performed with two Pistols/Revolvers)

The Trader The Trader can be unlocked for 15 Gold Bars by purchasing the Butcher’s Table from Cripps.

  • Players who play Red Dead Online on PlayStation 4 can obtain the Butcher’s Table for free, beginning Sept. 10.

Traders will partner with Cripps and work together to make the Cripps Trading Company a success. Traders will hunt animals and complete Resupply Missions to gather materials, which can then be sent to Cripps, who will turn them into sellable items. Once the merchandise has been created, Traders can send the items out for delivery to make a profit. The further away the delivery, the higher the payout, but the bigger the risks. Traders will also need to defend their camps from raids, manage transporting materials with specialized carts, and more.

  • Key Trader Skills and Items Include the following:
    Stew Pot (Camp Upgrade: Unlocks Stew Recipes to boost Cores)
    Ingredients Satchel Upgrade (Holds more items)
    Awareness (Identify enemy Trader wagons from further away)
    Canine Warning (Notifies you when your camp is about to be raided)
    Medium, Large Delivery Wagons (Hold more goods for transport)
    Weapons Locker
    Lance Knife
    Efficiency (Gain more from perfect carcasses)
    Materials Satchel Upgrade (Holds more items)
    Hunting Wagon (Carry multiple carcasses, hides, and pelts)
    Protection (Reduce the chance of camp raids)

The Collector The Collector can be unlocked by purchasing the Collector’s Bag from traveling saleswoman, Madam Nazar, for 15 Gold Bars.

  • Players who collect all 54 hidden GTA Online playing cards can obtain the Collector’s Bag for free, beginning Sept. 10.

The Collector will travel the world to find Tarot cards, buried treasure, heirlooms, and other valuables, which are scattered across the West. Ranking up grants special enhanced treasure-hunting skills, tools, and more.

  • Key Collector Skills and Items Include the following:
    Divination (Sense nearby collectibles)
    Pennington Field Shovel
    Potential (Detect disturbed earth in Eagle Eye)
    Intuition (Narrows search areas)
    Horse Saddlebag Upgrade (Holds more items)
    Refined Binoculars (Make dig sites glow from far away)
    Aguila Machete
    Metal Detector (Identify underground collectibles)
    Equine Assistance (Gather herbs while on horseback)
    Horse Lantern (Illuminate your path while riding)
    Valuables Satchel Upgrade (Holds more items)
